newsitem.title: USA: BIG Entertainment hires strategic adviser.
newsitem.headline: BIG Entertainment hires strategic adviser.

text.p: BIG Entertainment Inc said on Friday it had retained investment banking firm Wasserstein Perella & Co to provide financial and strategic advisory services.

"Wasserstein Perella will assist the company in its efforts to identify strategic opportunities in the media business that are consistent with the company's goal of increasing shareholder value," said Mitchell Rubenstein, chairman and chief executive of BIG Entertainment.
"Among the possible transactions that will be reviewed are joint ventures that will utilize the company's intellectual property rights and/or Entertainment Super-Kiosks."
Rubenstein added, "The company has already held preliminary discussions with possible strategic partners in this regard."
